item.title: The Risk of Creativity
item.description: IDEA: SUBMIT ME TO A MAGAZINE! “Achilles realizes he’s not immortal. He grows up. We have a sickness of immortality. You can be whatever you want. It’s like playing tennis with the net down. If there are no rules, frankly, then there’s no sense of the tragic. There’s no sense of the limitations of the human. And without a sense of limitations, funny enough, people become miserable.” https://youtu.be/mFWxELAjbyY?t=788 “The consequence of abolishing cultural taboos is not liberty but anomie.
